title: Nuestra Señora del Rosario
description: I developed a complete informational website for the Santa Cruz Nursing Home, collaborating with my classmates in the engineering course working on the frontend and backend.

title: Nuestra Señora Del Rosario - Admin
description: This repository contains the frontend code for the Santa Cruz Nursing Home project. It's a responsive web application built with modern technologies to provide information about the nursing home services.

title: Course Manage
description: This project is a web application designed for course management. It allows users to create and manage courses.

title: Clinic Management REST API
description: A comprehensive REST API built with .NET for clinic management system. Features include appointment scheduling, user authentication with JWT, role-based authorization, and email notifications. Supports multiple clinic branches, appointment types, and complete CRUD operations with Entity Framework and SQL Server.
